next_actions: Draft the formal `religiosity_class_gradients` promotion memo (PAP text + manuscript cites + BH plan) so the moderate/serious contrasts can freeze once reviewers agree.
Stress-test the serious-practice interaction (e.g., shrinkage priors or alternative anxiety codings) to decide if it should stay in the confirmatory family.

Map realistic options for reducing the H3 design effect (additional countries, pooled waves with new respondents, or alternative clustering metadata) now that naïve wave stacking still leaves power <0.3.
